copy: Grandpa

He died choking
on a plastic wrapper
Such a tragedy.

hitTriggers.copy: I don't know who they are.

copy:
The legendary golden
underpants of Emperor Zhangzong.
Grandpa was obsessed by them.

They where stolen by
Genghis Khan in 1210
and are lost ever since.

Grandpa making friends
in the Gobi desert.

'The SeaLion'
Grandpa used to travel
the world with this ship.
Just a painting.
I like it!
I like early mornings.
Waking up with the birds.
A cup of coffee at dawn.
Watching the morning unfold.

I think its going to
be a great day!

But let's read
that mail first.

Maybe I should read
that mail first?

An UNDERWEAR
SIMULATOR...

The AD AGENCY wants
me to make an
underwear simulator
Oh well.

Let's first go outside
and get some
inspiration.
and feed the fish.

Work can wait,
let's check outside.
Let's get some work done first.

Lets start with
rendering a triangle
The building block of worlds
and underwear simulators

First things first.
The underwear simulator
can wait.

Let's finnish the
underwear simulator
bla bla bal

Lets send it to the agency
I hope they like it
I hope they like it

Lots of sales
for the client.

And the ad agency
won a lot of awards.

They also
send me a package!

Let check the mailbox.
Maybe it already arrived.

I hardly get any
mail these days.

That must be the
package from
the agency.
I wonder what's inside.
Grandpa's grave.
He loved these woods.
Looks like some nice underpants

A hunter must have lost it
while roaming this woods.
I'll take them!

Grandpa kept his notes
in that bookcase
But it's locked.

Maybe I should
make a key for it.

It's still locked.
The Key will be finished soon.

My old mill.
It can almost make
everything.
So, lets make that key.

It's going to take a
while before its finished.

Let's do some other things
in the meantime.
It's running
It's going to take a while

I should check
on that key.

Lets see if I can
open that bookcase now.
A letter from grandpa!

UI letter:Hi Grandson, I discover the secret of
the golden underpants,
But the world is not ready for it

So I will take it
with me to my grave.
wink wink ;)
Grandpa
It's a shovel!
That will do!

I'm not going to dig
him up with my hands.
you won, end anime

the blabla plant
It should flower any time now.

It took me a long time,
but almost ready
my own revolutionary underpants

I only need some flowers of
the blabla plant to make it work

Finaly, this will
help me finish
the underpants
I'll take it

Let's see if
this will work.

It just needs it
time to finnish up
Looks like it worked
Let's take them.

The fish seem hungry
I should feed them.

I think I have some
fish food inside.
FOOD FOR FISH tm
Made from fish, for fish.
I'm going to need that.

Here you go Friends
Some delicious food!

That will take care
of them for a while.
They seem happy!

Not a care
in the world.
The fish left me a gift

It's the old underpants
of grandpa!

I assumed he was
buried with them?

A family of robins
lived there
this summer

I hope they come
back next year.

Oh, the wind must
have blown it crooked
I can't seem to reach it
That's a nice stick!
I'll keep that

Let's see if
I can fix that.

The birds must have
used that to make a nest.
I can use that.
I'm already using them.
Looks great on me!
I like those!
A little bit tight.
So soft on my skin.
The support I need.
Fits like a glove.
